https://www.clearchannel.no/specifikasjoner/play-mall/ | Note regarding second lengths: 5 sec is standard in the offer. It is therefore preferred that you deliver 5 sec. If you want 10 seconds instead, the number of VAC/Viewed impressions will be halved based on the offer. If it is important with 10 sec. creatives, please clarify this with the customer
Locations

Video + audio ad settings
File format YT url's: | .mov or .mp4
Resolution: | Recommended 1080i(1920×1080) or 720p(1280×720). Minimum 640x360 px.
Dimensions: | Horizontal 1920 × 1080, 1280 × 720, or 1440 × 1080 / Portrait 720 × 1280, 1080 × 1920, or 1080 × 1440
Preferred video codec: H.264 or DVCPRO HD
Preferred audio codec: MP3 or AAC
Frame rate: | 24 or 30 FPS
Aspect ratio: | Horizontal 16:9 or 4:3 / vertical 9:16 or 3:4
Bitrate: | At least 20 Mbps
Black bars and letterboxing: | No
Maximum file size: | 1 GB
Click-throughs: | A third-party click redirect or click command is acceptable.
Audio
Format: | Preferred audio codec MP3 or AAC
Resolution: | 128/192 kbit
Sound level flat | -23 LUFS/LKFS (recommended). Maximum -21 LUFS.
Sound level peak: | -12 dbTP.
TrueView video settings
Video requirements: | Must be uploaded to YouTube (send video URL)
Must allow embedding
Must be public or unlisted
True streaming is not allowed.
Minimum video length: | 12 seconds recommended (in order for public viewcounts to be incremented)
Maximum video length: | Less than 3 minutes recommended
Click destination: | Advertiser's website
Bumper video settings
Video requirements: | Must be uploaded to YouTube (send video URL)
Must allow embedding
Must be public or unlisted
True streaming is not allowed.
Maximum video length: | Maximum 6 seconds
In-feed ad video settings
Video requirements: | Must be uploaded to YouTube (send video URL)
Must allow embedding
Must be public or unlisted
True streaming is not allowed.
Thumbnail: | An image that's automatically generated from the videos in your YouTube channel (recommended) or an image that you manually upload (300×60)
Call to action: | Headline required (0-100)
Description 1 (0/35) (Description not shown in Suggestions)
Description 2 (0/35) (Description not shown in Suggestions)
Ads are shown: | YouTube search results / YouTube video suggestions / Video plays on YouTube watch or channel page
Clicks: | Clicking the ad will deliver a user to the YouTube watch page to view the video rather than playing the video within the ad unit itself
Click-throughs: | A third-party click redirect or click command is not acceptable.
YT Audio ad settings
File type: | Preferred .mp3 or .ogg
File size: | Up to 1 GB if hosted on Display & Video 360. To meet specs across exchanges, always upload a source file with the highest possible quality. Individual exchanges may have different maximum file sizes, so plan accordingly.
Landing page: | Required
Duration: | Audio creatives support a variety of durations. For access to most inventory, use a duration of 15 (aim for 40 words) or 30 seconds (aim for 55-75 words).
Spec best practice: | https://support.google.com/displayvideo/answer/7670334?hl=en
Youtube companion banner - Optional (not in-feed banner)
An image that's automatically generated from the videos in your YouTube channel (recommended) or an image that you manually upload (300×60)
JPG, PNG or GIF (recommended) GIF frame rate: fewer than 5 frames per second
GIF frame rate: fewer than 5 frames per second
150kb maximum size
18 - 24 FPS
30 seconds max animation time (user-initiated/autoplay allowed)
Companion banner animation time should be 15 seconds.
Video/audio specs Google: https://support.google.com/displayvideo/answer/3129957?hl=en
YT specs: https://support.google.com/displayvideo/answer/6274702

Format: | Preferred audio codec MP3 or AAC
Resolution: | 128/192 kbit

Must allow embedding

Video requirements: | Must be uploaded to YouTube (send video URL)

Call to action: | Headline required (0-100)
Description 1 (0/35) (Description not shown in Suggestions)
Description 2 (0/35) (Description not shown in Suggestions)

Clicks: | Clicking the ad will deliver a user to the YouTube watch page to view the video rather than playing the video within the ad unit itself

YT Audio ad settings
File type: | Preferred .mp3 or .ogg
File size: | Up to 1 GB if hosted on Display & Video 360. To meet specs across exchanges, always upload a source file with the highest possible quality. Individual exchanges may have different maximum file sizes, so plan accordingly.
Landing page: | Required
Duration: | Audio creatives support a variety of durations. For access to most inventory, use a duration of 15 (aim for 40 words) or 30 seconds (aim for 55-75 words).
Spec best practice: | https://support.google.com/displayvideo/answer/7670334?hl=en
Youtube companion banner - Optional (not in-feed banner)
An image that's automatically generated from the videos in your YouTube channel (recommended) or an image that you manually upload (300×60)
JPG, PNG or GIF (recommended) GIF frame rate: fewer than 5 frames per second
GIF frame rate: fewer than 5 frames per second
150kb maximum size
18 - 24 FPS
30 seconds max animation time (user-initiated/autoplay allowed)
Companion banner animation time should be 15 seconds.
Video/audio specs Google: https://support.google.com/displayvideo/answer/3129957?hl=en
YT specs: https://support.google.com/displayvideo/answer/6274702
